dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, the people of Eldoria are struggling to survive.

dialogues.speaker: Eira, the village elder
dialogues.text: We can't last much longer without the ancient magic that once protected our lands. The dark creatures gather at our borders, waiting for their chance to strike.

dialogues.speaker: Arin, a young apprentice
dialogues.text: But what about the prophecy? Doesn't it say that a chosen one will bring back the magic and save us?

dialogues.speaker: Eira, the village elder
dialogues.text: Yes, child. The prophecy speaks of a hero who will wield the ancient powers once more. But we have yet to find this chosen one.
